author: Magnen, Jean Chrysostôme, active 17th century
title: De tabaco exercitationes quatuordecim In quibus praeter historiam tabaci lectu jucundissinam, etiam herbae virtutes et vitia explicantur, ejusque usus ac abusus et quantum in medicina valeat ostenditur Joannes Chrysostomus Magnenus
imprint: "Amstelodami: ex off. Henr. et Theod. Boom, 1669"
